actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend title VII of the Older Americans Act relating to the nutrition program for the elderly to provide authorization of appropriations, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations totaling $525,000,000 for an additional three years (through June 30, 1977) to carry out the provisions of title VII of the Older Americans Act relating to the nutrition program for the elderly.

titles.title: A bill to amend title VII of the Older Americans Act relating to the nutrition program for the elderly to provide authorization of appropriations, and for other purposes.
